data.text: So mo asodifo, ampa ara sɛ, moka asɛm a ɛteɛ ana?
Dabi da! Modwene ntɛnkyew wɔ mo koma mu
Amumɔyɛfo fom kwan fi awo mu;
Wɔn ano bɔre te sɛ ɔwɔ de,
Ao Onyankopɔn, bubu ɛse a egu wɔn anom,
Ma wontwa mu nkɔ sɛ sunsuan;
Ma wɔnyɛ sɛ nwaw horɔdɔhorɔdɔ bi a ɔrenan agu wɔ bere a ɔretene no.
Ansa na mo nkuku bɛte nsɔe ano yaw,
Sɛ wɔtɔ were ma atreneefo a wɔn ani begye,
Afei nnipa bɛka se, “Ampa ara atreneefo kɔ so nya wɔn akatua;
